lead_paragraph: When he watches his older brother, the world kickboxing champion, get crippled while fighting the dirty Thai fighter Tong Po, Kurt Sloane swears revenge, and sets out to learn the art of Muay-Thai fighting with the help of an old master, before returning to take on Po.
